title: Tuesday Post Show (10-26-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (10-26-21)
description:
Bobby starts talking about the aftermath of today’s “World’s Hottest Shot” and how it was like an emergency room scene. Bobby talks about how he ended up getting some of the shot in his eye because it was on his hands…and had to do a segment of the show without being able to see. Bobby also updates everyone on his fantasy football bet from last night. Bobby also votes for the CMA’s during the post show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
